error.message: Call to deprecated function entity_get_bundles(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeBundleInfoInterface::getBundleInfo() for a single bundle, or \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeBundleInfoInterface::getAllBundleInfo() for all bundles.

Call to deprecated function entity_get_bundles(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeBundleInfoInterface::getBundleInfo() for a single bundle, or \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeBundleInfoInterface::getAllBundleInfo() for all bundles.

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.

Call to deprecated function entity_get_bundles(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeBundleInfoInterface::getBundleInfo() for a single bundle, or \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeBundleInfoInterface::getAllBundleInfo() for all bundles.

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.

Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to unique_field.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
Parse error in composer.json. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should be valid.
